title: PostgreSQL
description: Monitor postgres using logs and metrics.

metrics.name: postgresql.backends
metrics.description: The number of backends.

metrics.name: postgresql.bgwriter.buffers.allocated
metrics.description: Number of buffers allocated.

metrics.name: postgresql.bgwriter.buffers.writes
metrics.description: Number of buffers written.

metrics.name: postgresql.bgwriter.checkpoint.count
metrics.description: The number of checkpoints performed.

metrics.name: postgresql.bgwriter.duration
metrics.description: Total time spent writing and syncing files to disk by checkpoints.

metrics.name: postgresql.bgwriter.maxwritten
metrics.description: Number of times the background writer stopped a cleaning scan because it had written too many buffers.

metrics.name: postgresql.blocks_read
metrics.description: The number of blocks read.

metrics.name: postgresql.commits
metrics.description: The number of commits.

metrics.name: postgresql.connection.max
metrics.description: Configured maximum number of client connections allowed

metrics.name: postgresql.database.count
metrics.description: Number of user databases.

metrics.name: postgresql.database.locks
metrics.description: The number of database locks.

metrics.name: postgresql.db_size
metrics.description: The database disk usage.

metrics.name: postgresql.deadlocks
metrics.description: The number of deadlocks.

metrics.name: postgresql.index.scans
metrics.description: The number of index scans on a table.

metrics.name: postgresql.index.size
metrics.description: The size of the index on disk.

metrics.name: postgresql.operations
metrics.description: The number of db row operations.

metrics.name: postgresql.replication.data_delay
metrics.description: The amount of data delayed in replication.

metrics.name: postgresql.rollbacks
metrics.description: The number of rollbacks.

metrics.name: postgresql.rows
metrics.description: The number of rows in the database.

metrics.name: postgresql.sequential_scans
metrics.description: The number of sequential scans.

metrics.name: postgresql.table.count
metrics.description: Number of user tables in a database.

metrics.name: postgresql.table.size
metrics.description: Disk space used by a table.

metrics.name: postgresql.table.vacuum.count
metrics.description: Number of times a table has manually been vacuumed.

metrics.name: postgresql.temp_files
metrics.description: The number of temp files.

metrics.name: postgresql.wal.age
metrics.description: Age of the oldest WAL file.

metrics.name: postgresql.wal.delay
metrics.description: Time between flushing recent WAL locally and receiving notification that the standby server has completed an operation with it.

metrics.name: postgresql.wal.lag
metrics.description: Time between flushing recent WAL locally and receiving notification that the standby server has completed an operation with it.
